verses.verse: Then again <WH3254> <WH8686> Avraham <WH85> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a wife <WH802>, and her name <WH8034> was Keturah <WH6989>.
And she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Zimran <WH2175>, and Jokshan <WH3370>, and Medan <WH4091>, and Midian <WH4080>, and Ishbak <WH3435>, and Shuah <WH7744>.
And Jokshan <WH3370> begat <WH3205> <WH8804> SH'va <WH7614>, and Dedan <WH1719>. And the sons <WH1121> of Dedan <WH1719> were Asshurim <WH805>, and Letushim <WH3912>, and Leummim <WH3817>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Midian <WH4080>; Ephah <WH5891>, and Epher <WH6081>, and Hanoch <WH2585>, and Abida <WH28>, and Eldaah <WH420>. All these were the children <WH1121> of Keturah <WH6989>.
And Avraham <WH85> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> all that he had unto Yitz'chak <WH3327>.

But unto the sons <WH1121> of the concubines <WH6370>, which Avraham <WH85> had, Avraham <WH85> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> gifts <WH4979>, and sent them away <WH7971> <WH8762> from Yitz'chak <WH3327> his son <WH1121>, while he yet lived <WH2416>, eastward <WH6924>, unto the east <WH6924> country <WH776>.

And these are the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of Avraham's <WH85> life <WH2416> which he lived <WH2425> <WH8804>, an hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> threescore and fifteen <WH7657> <WH8141> <WH2568> years <WH8141>.

Then Avraham <WH85> gave up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8799>, and died <WH4191> <WH8799> in a good <WH2896> old age <WH7872>, an old man <WH2205>, and full <WH7649> of years; and was gathered <WH622> <WH8735> to his people <WH5971>.

And his sons <WH1121> Yitz'chak <WH3327> and Yishma`el <WH3458> buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in the cave <WH4631> of Machpelah <WH4375>, in the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the son <WH1121> of Zohar <WH6714> the Hittite <WH2850>, which is before <WH6440> Mamre <WH4471>;
The field <WH7704> which Avraham <WH85> purchased <WH7069> <WH8804> of the sons <WH1121> of Heth <WH2845>: there was Avraham <WH85> buried <WH6912> <WH8795>, and Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Avraham <WH85>, that 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> his son <WH1121> Yitz'chak <WH3327>; and Yitz'chak <WH3327> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> by <WH5973> the well Lahairoi <WH883>.

Now these are the generations <WH8435> of Yishma`el <WH3458>, Avraham's <WH85> son <WH1121>, whom Hagar <WH1904> the Egyptian <WH4713>, Sarah's <WH8283> handmaid <WH8198>, bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto Avraham <WH85>:

And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Yishma`el <WH3458>, by their names <WH8034>, according to their generations <WH8435>: the firstborn <WH1060> of Yishma`el <WH3458>, Nebajoth <WH5032>; and Kedar <WH6938>, and Adbeel <WH110>, and Mibsam <WH4017>,
And Mishma <WH4927>, and Dumah <WH1746>, and Massa <WH4854>,
Hadar <WH2316>, and Tema <WH8485>, Jetur <WH3195>, Naphish <WH5305>, and Kedemah <WH6929>:

These are the sons <WH1121> of Yishma`el <WH3458>, and these are their names <WH8034>, by their towns <WH2691>, and by their castles <WH2918>; twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> princes <WH5387> according to their nations <WH523>.

And these are the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Yishma`el <WH3458>, an hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and thirty <WH7970> <WH8141> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>: and he gave up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8799> and died <WH4191> <WH8799>; and was gathered <WH622> <WH8735> unto his people <WH5971>.

And they dwelt <WH7931> <WH8799> from Havilah <WH2341> unto Shur <WH7793>, that is before <WH6440> Egypt <WH4714>, as thou goest <WH935> <WH8800> toward Ashur <WH804>: and he died <WH5307> <WH8804> in the presence <WH6440> of all his brethren <WH251>.
And these are the generations <WH8435> of Yitz'chak <WH3327>, Avraham's <WH85> son <WH1121>: Avraham <WH85> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Yitz'chak <WH3327>:

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> was forty <WH705> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he took <WH3947> <WH8800> Rebekah <WH7259> to wife <WH802>, the daughter <WH1323> of Bethuel <WH1328> the Syrian <WH761> of Padanaram <WH6307>, the sister <WH269> to Laban <WH3837> the Syrian <WH761>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> intreated <WH6279> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> for <WH5227> his wife <WH802>, because she was barren <WH6135>: and the YY <WH3068> was intreated <WH6279> <WH8735> of him, and Rebekah <WH7259> his wife <WH802> conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>.

And the children <WH1121> struggled together <WH7533> <WH8704> within her <WH7130>; and she said <WH559> <WH8799>, If it be so, why am I thus <WH2088>? And she went <WH3212> <WH8799> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> are in thy womb <WH990>, and two manner <WH8147> of people <WH3816> shall be separated <WH6504> <WH8735> from thy bowels <WH4578>; and the one people <WH3816> shall be stronger <WH553> <WH8799> than the other people <WH3816>; and the elder <WH7227> shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799> the younger <WH6810>.
And when her days <WH3117> to be delivered <WH3205> <WH8800> were fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8799>, behold, there were twins <WH8380> in her womb <WH990>.
And the first <WH7223> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> red <WH132>, all over like an hairy <WH8181> garment <WH155>; and they called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Esav <WH6215>.

And after <WH310> that came <WH3318> his brother <WH251> out <WH3318> <WH8804>, and his hand <WH3027> took hold <WH270> <WH8802> on Esav's <WH6215> heel <WH6119>; and his name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> <WH8799> Ya`akov <WH3290>: and Yitz'chak <WH3327> was threescore <WH8346> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when she bare <WH3205> <WH8800> them.

And the boys <WH5288> grew <WH1431> <WH8799>: and Esav <WH6215> was a cunning <WH3045> <WH8802> hunter <WH6718>, a man <WH376> of the field <WH7704>; and Ya`akov <WH3290> was a plain <WH8535> man <WH376>, dwelling <WH3427> <WH8802> in tents <WH168>.
And Yitz'chak <WH3327> loved <WH157> <WH8799> Esav <WH6215>, because he did eat <WH6310> of his venison <WH6718>: but Rebekah <WH7259> loved <WH157> <WH8802> Ya`akov <WH3290>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> sod <WH2102> <WH8686> pottage <WH5138>: and Esav <WH6215> came <WH935> <WH8799> from the field <WH7704>, and he was faint <WH5889>:

And Esav <WH6215> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Ya`akov <WH3290>, Feed <WH3938> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, with <WH4480> that same <WH122> red <WH122> pottage; for I am faint <WH5889>: therefore was his name <WH8034> called <WH7121> <WH8804> Edom <WH123>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Sell <WH4376> <WH8798> me this day <WH3117> thy birthright <WH1062>.
And Esav <WH6215> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I am at the point <WH1980> <WH8802> to die <WH4191> <WH8800>: and what profit shall this birthright <WH1062> do to me?

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Swear <WH7650> <WH8734> to me this day <WH3117>; and he sware <WH7650> <WH8735> unto him: and he sold <WH4376> <WH8799> his birthright <WH1062> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>.

Then Ya`akov <WH3290> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> Esav <WH6215> bread <WH3899> and pottage <WH5138> of lentiles <WH5742>; and he did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went his way <WH3212> <WH8799>: thus Esav <WH6215> despised <WH959> <WH8799> his birthright <WH1062>.
